mapper.select: SELECT hp.HOTPLACE_NUMBER, hp.HOTPLACE_STATION, hp.HOTPLACE_TITLE, hp.HOTPLACE_HOURS, hp.HOTPLACE_ADDRESS, hp.HOTPLACE_LINK, hp.HOTPLACE_REST_NUMBER, hp.HOTPLACE_ATTRACTION_NUMBER, hr.HOTPLACE_REST_CUISINE, hr.HOTPLACE_REST_MENU, ha.HOTPLACE_ATTRACTION_CONTENT FROM TBL_HOTPLACE hp LEFT JOIN TBL_HOTPLACE_REST hr ON hp.HOTPLACE_REST_NUMBER = hr.HOTPLACE_REST_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_HOTPLACE_ATTRACTION ha ON hp.HOTPLACE_ATTRACTION_NUMBER = ha.HOTPLACE_ATTRACTION_NUMBER WHERE hp.HOTPLACE_STATION = #{hotplaceStation}
